Entry.Name: Lucky 13
Entry.Description: By exploiting the structure of the Cipher Block Chaining (CBC) mode, an attacker can infer the content of a transmission. The attack is performed by capturing, tampering (actually damaging) and re-transmitting the messages sent by the client to see how the server responds. The attack, by breaching in the authentication mechanism, has a serious impact on the transmission.

Mitigation.Textual: Update the TLS library to a version that contains the custom mitigations (e.g. OpenSSL v1.0.2h+).
